entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
